name: Pirate Adventure Trivia Game
description: Players go on a fictional pirate journey where they battle bad pirates via trivia games and get real-time feedback for correct/incorrect answers while also being able to track their health and store rewards earned from the different trivia levels.

name: Reader's Jounal
skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Embedded JavaScript (EJS), MongoDB, Node.js, JSON, RESTful, Express.js
description: Users are able to login/logout and enables users to log their readings, whether books, articles, or other materials, with features for commenting on entire readings or specific chapters/sections, and the ability to add favorites for easy access.

name: Sound Scope
skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Tailwind, MongoDB, Node.js, JSON, Mongoose, Express.js
description: Users can browse music and artists through the Spotify API, add songs or artists to their favorites for easy access and personalized playlists, and log in and out securely

name: Garden Health
skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Amazon Web Service (AWS), Express.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, JSON, Node.js
description: Players go on a fictional pirate journey where they battle bad pirates via trivia games and get real-time feedback for correct/incorrect answers while also being able to track their health and store rewards earned from the different trivia levels.
